# repo Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    petstore = {
      source  = "testing/petstore"
      version = "2.2.3"
    }
  }
}

provider "petstore" {
  # Configuration options
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `server_url` (String) Server URL (defaults to http://petstore.swagger.io/v1)
